ValidationRule.description: deactivated as part of the Story SFDC-18680
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.Name=='MSP Agreement',ISBLANK(TEXT(Amendment_Source_MSP_only__c)), TEXT(SBQQ__Status__c) <> "Draft", $Profile.Name == "Apollo: Custom- Sales Profile", BEGINS($UserRole.Name, "MSP - RAD") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select an 'Amendment Source' before moving the Quote stage.
